thread.title: SEE IT: Little girl meets Pope Francis, steals hat
thread.title_full: SEE IT: Little girl meets Pope Francis, steals hat

author: BRIAN LISI
title: SEE IT: Little girl meets Pope Francis, steals hat
text:
10:00 AM 
Thou Shalt Not Steal ... from the Pope. 
Set off the white smoke at the Sistine Chapel because we have a new pope of cuteness and her name is Shirley. 
Openly disobeying the crystal-clear commandment created for thieves, the pint-sized pontifex pilferer was brought to meet Pope Francis for a blessing only to make a grab for his zucchetto. Leggo my zucchetto!
